alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 30 at 2:58AM MST until October 30 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 25 to 30 degrees for elevations above 4000 feet and near-freezing temperatures of 30 to 35 degrees above 3000 feet. * WHERE...Portions of Yavapai and northern Gila counties. This includes Seligman, Prescott, Chino Valley, Crown King, Cordes Junction, Cottonwood, Camp Verde, Strawberry, Young, and Payson. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Freezing conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northern Gila County; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
